bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9"
bearer.name: Authorization
